@00h
1     ldi  0,#0       "r0 <= 0
1010010000000000
0000000000000000


@02h
2     call run8_outer "r0 <= 64
1000010000011000


@03h
3     str 0,#0        "m(0) <= r0
1010100000000000
0000000000000000


@05h
4     jmp end         "makes end clean
1000000001010100


@06h
8     run8_outer:      "runs run8_inner 8 times


@06h
9     ldi 10,#8   "r10 <= 8
1010011010000000
0000100000000000


@08h
10     loop0:


@08h
11     call run8_inner
1000010000110100


@09h
12     sub 10,#1   "r10 -= 1
0010111010000000
0000000100000000


@0Bh
13     bne 10,loop0 "repeat 8 times
0111001010111101


@0Ch
14     rts
1000100000000000


@0Dh
16     run8_inner:


@0Dh
17     ldi 11,#8   "r11 <= 8
1010011011000000
0000100000000000


@0Fh
18     loop1:


@0Fh
19     add 0,#1    "r0 += 1
0001110000000000
0000000100000000


@11h
20     sub 11,#1   "r11 -= 1
0010111011000000
0000000100000000


@13h
21     bne 11,loop1 "repeat 8 times
0111001011111100


@14h
22     rts
1000100000000000


@15h
24     end:
